19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Clean the car interior and manage the cleaning tools (mop and cloth), including fetching and storing them.

episodes.name: Clean and Store Tools
episodes.description: The person picks up a mop, sweeps the floor inside the car, closes a door, places the mop down, opens a door, and puts a cloth inside the car.

episodes.name: Fetch Cloth
episodes.description: The person moves to a cabinet, opens it, picks up a cloth, and moves toward the wall while holding the cloth.

episodes.name: Retrieve Mop
episodes.description: The person picks the mop-stick from the wall using hand2.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Prepare and use a laptop workstation by powering and positioning the laptop, connecting the charger, arranging peripherals (keyboard and mouse), and interacting with the keyboard and mouse.

episodes.name: Laptop interactions
episodes.description: The person presses keys and a laptop button, then closes, unplugs, puts away, picks up, places, and opens the laptop.

episodes.name: Connect charger
episodes.description: The person picks up the charger and inserts it into the laptop and the plug into the socket.

episodes.name: Place keyboard
episodes.description: The person picks up the keyboard and places it on the table.

episodes.name: Keyboard use
episodes.description: The person presses keys on the keyboard.

episodes.name: Mouse setup & use
episodes.description: The person picks up the mouse, places it on the table, holds and moves it, then presses the mouse button.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare and cook an onion (wash, cut, place in pot, and start cooking).

episodes.name: Start water
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap to begin a water flow.

episodes.name: Wash onion
episodes.description: The person washes the onion under water.

episodes.name: Prepare pot & slice
episodes.description: The person manipulates the pot and tap, transfers the onion into the pot, fills the pot with water, then places and slices the onion on the board and puts the knife down.

episodes.name: Release onion
episodes.description: The person releases the onion from their hand.

episodes.name: Cook setup & peel
episodes.description: The person places the pot on the cooker, turns the cooker on, picks up the knife, holds the onion, and peels it.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: Organize and use tools to remove a wheel and tighten/loosen fasteners: gather and stow tools, tighten a bolt, then bring, remove and adjust the wheel while tightening nuts.

episodes.name: Collect and Box Tools
episodes.description: The person picks up various tools (wrench, plier, spanner), handles them and places them into a box, covers the box with a lid and performs a tightening action with a wrench.

episodes.name: Bolt Tightening
episodes.description: The person puts a wrench down, picks up a spanner, positions it onto a bolt, holds it and rotates the spanner to tighten the bolt, and places a wrench on the table.

episodes.name: Remove Wheel
episodes.description: The person brings and adjusts the wheel, takes the wheel off, holds a wrench and tightens a nut (likely related to wheel removal/installation).

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: bring, adjust, take-off, hold, tighten

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Assemble and fasten wooden parts by clamping, drilling, and screwing components together.

episodes.name: Fasten screw
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and a screw, positions the screw into the wood, screws it in, and then releases/puts down the screwdriver and screw.

episodes.name: Prepare & clamp
episodes.description: The person picks up and positions clamps, tightens/loosens them, removes a clamp, picks up and places a piece of wood on the workbench, aligns a wood-piece, and re-clamps it (ending by picking up the drill).

episodes.name: Drill holes
episodes.description: The person holds the workpiece, picks up and uses the drill to make holes (drill/withdraw), puts the drill down between uses, and finally releases the held wood-piece.

episodes.name: Final screw placement
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and a screw and positions the screw on the wood-piece for fastening.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Actions: hold

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.description: Actions: drill, withdraw, put-down

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.description: Actions: release

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, position

f5c27b88-a3eb-4290-9102-0307c2809241.overall_goal: Clean and organize books and the bookshelf (remove dust, wipe surfaces, and reshelve books)

episodes.name: Arrange & Place Book
episodes.description: The person arranges a book and places or aligns it on different surfaces, then takes it off.

episodes.name: Brush Dust Removal
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush from the floor, removes dust with it, and then puts the brush back down.

episodes.name: Wipe with Rag
episodes.description: The person holds a rag, wipes the bookshelf with it, and then puts the rag down on the floor.

episodes.name: Reshelve & Inspect Books
episodes.description: The person takes and moves books between shelf and floor, picks and places books on the shelf, checks them, and takes a book off.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Actions: hold, take, put-down, pick, put, check, take-off

97ad4e58-c64f-47e3-8d84-6aad38bdfbc8.overall_goal: Attach and tighten a bolt onto the machine using hand tools

episodes.name: Initial placement & tighten
episodes.description: The person picks up and uses a hammer, then picks and positions a bolt on the machine and tightens it with a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Repeat installation & final tighten
episodes.description: The person places the screwdriver aside, re-picks the bolt, positions it on the machine, and then uses the screwdriver to tighten the bolt again.

a20c2c22-cc2c-487e-8041-f0b33f4845ca.overall_goal: Attach and shape fabric onto furniture using cutting, gluing, and nailing

episodes.name: Cut and Prepare Fabric
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors and holds the fabric while cutting it, then puts the scissors down.

episodes.name: Glue Fabric
episodes.description: The person releases the fabric, picks up glue, applies it to the fabric, and smoothens the fabric.

episodes.name: Prepare Fasteners
episodes.description: The person puts down the glue, picks up a hammer and a nail, then drives the nail into the furniture.

episodes.name: Attach and Trim Fabric
episodes.description: The person adjusts the fabric, picks up nails and continues driving them into the furniture, sets down the hammer, then picks up scissors to trim the fabric and puts the scissors away.

860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Assemble and affix materials onto paper by folding, attaching, and applying glue using hands and a brush.

episodes.name: Arrange and Attach
episodes.description: The person manipulates a metal board, folds and positions paper, and attaches/presses cardboard onto the paper, placing items on the desk or paper as needed.

episodes.name: Prepare Brush
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush from the desk and dips it into glue to prepare adhesive.

episodes.name: Apply Glue
episodes.description: The person holds the paper and applies glue (with the brush) onto the paper to affix components.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Person inspects and manipulates a card on a table by touching/tapping, picking it up to check it, and putting it back.

episodes.name: Initial touch/tap
episodes.description: The person repeatedly touches and taps the card while it lies on the table, likely to inspect or orient it.

episodes.name: Pick up and check
episodes.description: The person picks the card up using hand1 and checks or inspects it while holding it.

episodes.name: Put down and tap
episodes.description: The person puts the card down on the table and then taps it while it is on the table.

episodes.name: Second pickup/check
episodes.description: The person again picks the card up with hand1 and checks it while holding it.

episodes.name: Second put-down
episodes.description: The person places the card back down onto the table.

episodes.name: Third pickup/check
episodes.description: The person picks the card up again with hand1 and inspects it.

episodes.name: Final put-down
episodes.description: The person places the card down on the table to finish the sequence.
